title: Bug 16822 - Search results not removed when class is moved
OB: Move X.java to 'P/src2'. Observe that the search result is still displayed in the search view. Attempting to double click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog with the following message: 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist'.
EB: Search results should be automatically removed from the search view when a class is moved.
SR: The search results for the moved class should be cleared from the search view to ensure accurate and valid search results.
